name: Olympus Ascent
description:
In this table top game based on Greek Mythology, 2-4 players will need to journey to Mt Olympus, along the way it will get progressively more difficult as the chances of danger increase in each area. Make strategic decisions using blessing cards and halt your opposition with curse cards. Will you rush ahead and hope to reach the end first? Will you hold back and bank on others downfall? 

https://tabletopia.com/playground/olympus-ascent-txxhii/play-now

The expected length of a two player game is 10-15minutes or less, although your first may take a little bit longer. The rule book can be downloaded below.

Tabletopia can be confusing without some controls if it is your first time:

Instructions:

  • If you are having trouble loading the game page, try refreshing, it may take multiple tries.
  • Right click to rotate the camera, scroll to zoom and WASD to move the camera.
  • Hold shift to allow yourself to select all card piles at once wit the mouse.
  • Right click to shuffle the piles
  • You can highlight a piece with the mouse and press space to view it closely
  • Highlight the mountain card pile and scroll up to change the amount of cards to pick up. Scroll to 24 and place them at the top of the board. Continue to Level 2, desert cards closely underneath and Level 1 River and Forest Lands.
  • Pick up a blessing and curse card to start with from the pile, drop them at the centre bottom of the screen to put them in your hand. Or right click and use 'draw', be careful to select '1'.
  • You can scroll up and down on a counter to increase its health or decrease it
  • Pressing R over the die rolls it.
